Uses of Interface
org.aeonbits.owner.loaders.Loader

  • Packages that use Loader 
    Package Description
    org.aeonbits.owner
    The goal of OWNER API is to minimize the code required to handle application configuration through Java properties files.
    org.aeonbits.owner.loaders
    Provides interfaces and classes to allow OWNER to load properties from several file formats.

    • Uses of Loader in org.aeonbits.owner

      Methods in org.aeonbits.owner with parameters of type Loader 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void ConfigFactory.registerLoader​(Loader loader)
      Registers a loader to enables additional file formats.
      void Factory.registerLoader​(Loader loader)
      Registers a loader to enables additional file formats.

    • Uses of Loader in org.aeonbits.owner.loaders

      Classes in org.aeonbits.owner.loaders that implement Loader 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PropertiesLoader
      A loader able to read properties from standard Java properties files.
      class  XMLLoader
      A loader able to read properties from standard XML Java properties files, as well as user defined XML properties files.
      class  ZooKeeperLoader
